text: Stig Johansson (21 February 1939 - 22 April 2010) was a Swedish-Norwegian linguist. He was born in Traryd in Småland, Sweden. He was hired as an associate professor at the University of Oslo in 1976, and served as a professor from 1982 to 2008. He was inducted into the Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters in 1991, and received an honorary degree from Lund University in 1999. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Markaryd Municipality Category:Linguists from Sweden Category:Swedish emigrants to Norway Category:University of Oslo faculty Category:Members of the Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters
title: Stig Johansson (linguist)
